That sounds like a great plan! Focusing on the cafe's interior and the coffee itself will give your audience a sense of what makes this spot special, and sharing a personal story will add an emotional layer to the Reel.

Mentioning your previous post and the 25 new followers you gained is a great way to:

1. Encourage engagement: By sharing your success, you're encouraging your audience to engage with your content and potentially attract new followers.
2. Provide context: It gives context to your Reel and helps your audience understand why you're sharing this particular spot with them.
3. Build credibility: It shows that your content is resonating with people, and they're interested in what you have to say.

Here's a possible script to get you started:

**Shot 1: Cafe interior**
(Show the cozy atmosphere, decorations, and comfortable seating)

**Shot 2: Coffee**
(Show a beautifully presented cup of coffee, with a design on top)

**Shot 3: Personal story**
(Look directly at the camera and share your story)

"I just got back from Hawaii, and I'm still dreaming about this amazing cafe I discovered. I gained 25 new followers on Instagram last week, probably thanks to my previous post about my vacation. But this cafe was truly a highlight of my trip. I love how cozy and inviting it is, and the coffee is simply amazing. I came back here every morning to start my day off right."

**B-roll footage:**
(Cut to shots of the cafe's exterior, patrons chatting, baristas working, or coffee beans being ground)

**Transitions:**
(Use smooth transitions to move between shots, such as fade-ins, fade-outs, or swipes)

Remember to keep your Reel short, engaging, and visually appealing. Use good lighting, sound, and editing to make it professional and polished. Good luck, and have fun!
